decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of five years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990. | Detailed drawings or samples of materials, as appropriate, in respect of the following shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority in writing prior to the commencement of work:  a). 'conservation' rooflight (to be flush with the roof slope).  Such details shall be implemented only in accordance with the drawings as approved.  Reason: To safeguard the character of the listed building, in accordance with the Council's adopted UDP policy B21; and replacement UDP policy 4.6.
description: Installation of 'conservation' style rooflight in side elevation
